OpportunityShare.name: OpportunityShare
OpportunityShare.description: Represents a sharing entry on an Opportunity.

IsDeleted.description: Indicates whether the object has been moved to the Recycle Bin (true) or not (false). Label is Deleted.

OpportunityAccessLevel.description: Level of access that the user or group has to the opportunity. The possible values are: Read Edit All—This value is not valid when creating, updating, or deleting records. This field must be set to an access level that’s higher than the org’s default access level for opportunities.

OpportunityId.description: ID of the opportunity associated with this sharing entry. This field can’t be updated.

RowCause.description: Reason that this sharing entry exists. If you’re creating a sharing entry, the only permitted value is Manual. If no value is specified, the field defaults to Manual. All other RowCause values are read-only. After the sharing entry is created, this field can’t be edited.

UserOrGroupId.description: ID of the user or group that has been given access to the opportunity. This field can’t be updated.

OpportunityShare.accessRules: As of Summer ’20 and later, only users with access to the Opportunity object can access this object.
